# Karibu - Venture Summary

For Operational leaders that need to keep people and processes in sync, Karibu is a conversational alignment platform that cuts ramp-up time, reduces attrition, and aligns teams at scale. Unlike legacy LMS tools, our product automates content synthesis from your insitutional knowledge.

## Problem

-  1 in 5 new hires leave within their first 45 days
- 90% of Training is Forgotten
- $Bns Wasted annually

## Market Opportunity

- **Fast-Growing Teams in Knowledge-Heavy, High-Turnover Sectors (US)**: $230,000,000,000

## Solution

- Karibu automates learning content from an organization’s DNA and delivers it through adaptive, conversational AI

## Milestones

| Milestone | Duration | Funding Needed |
|-----------|----------|----------------|
| Onboard 3–6 Beta Partners   Validate features,  Capture case studies   Build proof points of traction | 24 weeks | $500,000 |
| Partner with  Ops & Consulting Firms   Partners author journeys in marketplace   Champion-led referrals expand adoption | 40 weeks |  |
| Scale (Activate Distribution Flywheel | 24 weeks |  |
